data.comment: The match is underway at Deepdale.
Goal! Riley McGree gives Birmingham a 0-1 lead in Preston.
In the minute 24, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Jayden Stockley.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 57, The away team have replaced Jonathan Leko with Jeremie Bela. This is the first substitution made today by Aitor Karanka.
Alex Neil is making the team's first substitution at Deepdale with Ryan Ledson replacing Paul Gallagher.
The home team replace Darnell Fisher with Joe Rafferty.
In the minute 75, Alex Neil (Preston) is making a third substitution, with Emil Riis Jakobsen replacing Jayden Stockley.
Gary Gardner is on a sub for Riley McGree for Birmingham.
Goal! Gary Gardner gives Birmingham a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 86, Maxime Colin is replacing Josh Dacres Cogley for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
